product_name: REI Snowy Creek Fleece Mittens - Toddler Girls' - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The toddler girls' REI Snowy Creek fleece mittens are made of soft polyester fleece to keep little fingers warm during fall and winter outings. Fleece dries quickly and provides light insulation even when wet. Soft polyester lining is soft and comfortable. Elastic and cinch straps at wrists help seal in warmth. Overstock.
short_description: The toddler girls' REI Snowy Creek fleece mittens are made of soft polyester fleece to keep little fingers warm during fall and winter outings.
